What are the treatments for La Crosse encephalitis ?,"How might La Crosse (LAC) encephalitis be treated? There is no specific treatment for LAC encephalitis. Severe cases are treated with supportive therapy which may include hospitalization, respiratory support, IV fluids and prevention of other infections.[9633]",GARD,La Crosse encephalitis
